707082f-b.title: Brooklyn: Atlantic Ave. - Flatbush Ave.
707082f-b.text:
Times Plaza, converging point of Atlantic, Flatbush, and Fourth Avenues, showing the B. M. T. elevated on Flatbush Avenue and the I. R. T. subway entrance on Atlantic Avenue. This area is also a terminal for street car lines
and buses.
June 15, 1940
Views 1,2,S
P. L. Sperr
707082f-b.folder: Atlantic Ave. & Flatbush Ave., Brooklyn, NY

704189f-a.title: Brooklyn: Flatbush Avenue - Atlantic Avenue
704189f-a.text:
Flatbush Ave., east side, from and including Atlantic Ave., to, but not including Hanson lace. A view of the Long Island Railroad Station is at the left, and the Brooklyn Manhattan Transit Company Structure, at
the right.
About 1916.
Ewing Galloway.

704194f-a.title: Brooklyn: Flatbush Avenue - Atlantic Avenue
704194f-a.text:
Flatbush Avenue, east side, between Atlantic Avenue and Pacific Street, showing the entrance to the B. M. T. subway station. Shown, too, are rears of tenements fronting on Atlantio Avenue and bearing numbers 608 to 616.
May 17, 1940
L. Sperr
